Ну что сказать... TM2 - это весело!) Скачивайте и пробуйте - игра бесплатна. Это просто мясо. Рубилово. И весь этот фарш замаскирован в мультяшную графику) Ну разве это не мило?). Рекомендую вам хотя - бы просто поиграть, попробовать, если вы не играли в "тимку". Обещаю - будет весело. Пробуйте разные классы, ищите ко всем классам свой подход (он везде будет разный). Также каждый класс по - своему хорош на разных картах и режимах. В последнее время кроме этой игры и ни во что играть не хочется, так как тут можно просто играть на расслабоне. Игра - мясо для расслабона (или остудить perdak от танков, кс, доты и других игр)

I like this game, but i have some issues with i dealing with new players. I recently introduced TF2 to by brother and he dosen't like the game because he keeps getting slaughtered. Some would say "git gud scrub" but he wont bother loading up the game because he gets rekt. I know there is a traning in the game but its hard to convince him to load up the game, let alone get him into a bots server. So if this issue was fixed i would give a yes, but for now it gets a no from me.

This is an amazing game. And to top it off, it's free! I would highly recommend anyone who likes team based fps's to try it. 10/10.

Edit:

 After 1000 hours of gameplay, I can comfortably say Team Defence Fort 2, the 2019 hat simulator, is the best fps of all time. Its charming and unique character makes it a masterpiece.

e cel ai de cacat joc 

Jedna z lepszych gier tego typu. Gra jest głównie oparta na wyborze jednej z 9 postaci i grania nią podczas całego meczu. Dobrym posunięciem twórców było danie każdej postaci różnych broni i umiejętności przez co znalezienie swojej ulubionej postaci trochę zajmie. Ja ograniczę się w tej recenzji do plusów i minusów która ja zauważyłem grając w tą grę:
Plusy tej gry to:
+ 9 różnych postaci
+ różnorakie bronie do danej postaci
+dużo trybów  i map
Minusy tej gry to :
- długie ładowanie się mapy (kiedyś było krótsze)
- brak wybrania mapy na którą chce się wejść
Od razu podkreślam że to jest moja subiektywna opinia i możecie się z nią nie zgadzać

TF2 é um ótimo FPS, sempre foi. Pode não ter os gráficos lindos como um dia já foram, mas as mecanicas seguram o jogo pois o mantém divertido e sempre muito animado. Apesar de ser a MALDITA QUINTA VEZ QUE LEVO UM BACKSTAB DESSE SPY MALDITO AAAAAAAAAAAA

This is a good FPS game, but not for beginners. Players can be ruthless in community games, but other games, like Mann vs. Machine allow the player to worry about bots rather than other players. The game is really fun and has a great online community, comics, and storyline. Players are generally friendly, although some matches can get pretty heated as chats are not filtered/censored. The controls of the game are really simple too. You really only need to know how to move using WASD+a mouse, firing weapons with mouse 1, and changing weapons with the mouse wheel. If you want to learn about each class of mercenaries individually, there are plenty of tutorials on YouTube since the game has been out for 10 years now.
Very enjoyable FPS games, you can play however you wish and if you can get trough the ocasional toxic person there shouldn't be a problem. It's free, so can you really go wrong?
